thread.title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens little changed, tech drags

title: US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens little changed, tech drags
text:
May 11, 2018 / 1:40 PM / Updated an hour ago US STOCKS SNAPSHOT-Wall St opens little changed, tech drags Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 11 (Reuters) - Wall Street indexes opened little changed on Friday as losses in Symantec and Nvidia offset gains in healthcare and telecom sectors.
The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 19.11 points, or 0.08 percent, at the open to 24,758.64. The S&P 500 opened lower by 0.37 points, or 0.01 percent, at 2,722.70. The Nasdaq Composite dropped 11.01 points, or 0.15 percent, to 7,393.97 at the opening bell. (Reporting by Sruthi Shankar in Bengaluru; Editing by Anil D’Silva)
